** PhD student in Information Technology at the National University of Ireland, Galway, <nowiki>[[http://www.deri.ie|Digital Enterprise Research Institute]]</nowiki>,

== Open source involvements ==

My activities are not only related to Ubuntu but also to the philosophy of open source software as all. Currently I am involved in several open source projects and communities supporting and promoting open source software use.
